title: QCMobility - Maritimer Verkehr - JSON commons
description: This data structure contains the commons for maritime traffic planning and lock scheduling
$comment: (c) Dr. Armin Wolf, Fraunhofer FOKUS, Berlin, Germany, 2025, all rights reserved

IntArray1D.description: a 1-dimensional non-empty array containing integer values

items.description: each entry is an integer value

IntArray2D.description: a 2-dimensional non-empty integer array containing non-empty entries

items.description: each entry of the 'outer' 2d-array is an non-empty integer 1d-array

IntArray3D.description: a 3-dimensional non-empty integer array containing non-empty entries

items.description: each entry of the 'outer' 3d-array is an non-empty integer 2d-array
each entry of the 'outer' 2d-array is an non-empty integer 1d-array

IntArray4D.description: a 4-dimensional non-empty integer array containing non-empty entries

items.description: each entry of the 'outer' 4d-array is an non-empty integer 3d-array
each entry of the 'outer' 3d-array is an non-empty integer 2d-array
each entry of the 'outer' 2d-array is an non-empty integer 1d-array
